text: Ezɨ me kamaghɨn a ikaragha ghaze, “Gumazir mam tuavimɨn e batogha ghaze, ‘Ia uamategh mangɨ, Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn akar kamɨn gun atrivim mɨkemegh. Akar kam kamakɨn: Ia manmaghsua Ekronɨn asem Balsebupɨn azangsɨghasa? Ia ti Godɨn tam Israelɨn kantrin aven itir puvatɨ, egha ia mangasa? Bar guizbangɨra, nɨ ua deraghan kogham. Bar puvatɨ. Nɨ kamaghɨra uan dakozimɨn irɨghɨv kɨ mangɨ aremegham.’ ”
